mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS 'userId', content_id AS 'contentId', SUM( CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN 1 -- 浏览(VIEW)得1分 WHEN type = 2 THEN 1 -- 点赞(UPVOTE)得1分 WHEN type = 3 THEN 3 -- 收藏(SAVE)得3分 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'score' FROM active_net WHERE content_type = #{contentType} GROUP BY user_id, content_id ORDER BY user_id, content_id;
